notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: N.P.V. conducted the analysis, interpretation of the results, and assisted in writing the manuscript; O.A.A. and T.H.P. conducted the lipidomics analysis and data interpretation; C.M. conducted the colorimetric analysis; A.M. and G.C. assisted in the data analysis; P.S. and D.K. assisted in the sensory perception experimental design, data collection and interpretation of the results; R.H.T. conceptualized the study, designed the experiments, and assisted in writing the manuscript. All the authors read and edited the manuscript.
